physical_appearance: The focus scope is black in colour. At the base of the scope, there is a silver-coloured surface where information is displayed. The numerals '5431', together with the company initials 'LBL' and the words 'Deluxe Focus Scope Made in Japan' are displayed. Some discolouration can be discerned on the body of the scope.
sgcool_label_text: A focus scope is a tool used to fine tune the focus of the grains of the negative in photographic film processing. This grain focuser is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm, which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.
context_21: 45 Jalan Pemimpin, #09-00 Foo Wah Industrial Building, Thomson, Singapore
context_20: The set of equipment was used by The Picture Farm Pte Ltd
